Hey everyone,

I have a Ramly Johnny Evers card for sale. The card has been trimmed on the right side. The good news is there are no creases and the photo of Evers looks great.

Asking $150  SOLD


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1029&pictureid=23458[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1029&pictureid=23459[/IMG]

Please email or message me here with any questions or offers. My email is [url]pgbaldes@gannett.com[/url]

Thanks!
Peter Baldes
Hi, can I get a pic of the Evers please? Thanks...Dan
